mdRecord.dcterms:title: The home of Washington Illustrated. No. 10
East Front of Mansion, from S. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of east front of the mansion at Mount Vernon taken from the southeast, c. 1870. Balustrade and porch have been temporarily removed. Mounted on black board. This stereograph is No. 10 of a set of 30 as indicated on the printed list found on the reverse of the card. Photographed by (Alexander) Gardner, 921 Penna. Avenue, Washington, D. C. For the Ladies' Mount Vernon Association. For Sale only at Mount Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
